#summary How to install pidgin-musictracker
#labels Featured

= Windows =

  * [http://code.google.com/p/pidgin-musictracker/downloads/list?q=opsys=Windows Download] and run the latest version of the Windows installer
  * Use Pidgin's Tools/Plugins menu to enable and configure the musictracker plugin
  * If it's not autodetected, [Configuring configure] your music player to work with musictracker

= Linux =

  * Use your distribution's package management tool to install the latest version of the pidgin-musictracker pacakge
  * Use Pidgin's Tools/Plugins menu to enable and configure the musictracker plugin
  * If it's not autodetected, [Configuring configure] your music player to work with musictracker
